review: The pic quality seems good. I didnt watch any thing yet. Was surprised to see how many tv shows and movies you have to pay for.
author: min314

review: Easy to install. Works as advertised.
author: Karl Strom

review: Not as good as the Roku 3. The Roku 3 has more apps and channels and it's faster.
author: Amande Trang

review: Love it. Just bought a second one. Who needs cable these days.
author: Cherish

review: I have been an apple tv fan.  I had a gift card and decided to try Amazon Fire TV.  What a great product.  Much better viewing options than Apple and it links to Prime so you get a ton of extra channels to view.  Voice search is worthless - but given the ads I did not expect much.
author: Teo Leonard
